website_summaries.verdict: SimpleScan DP is designed primarily for scanning to the cloud, using the SimpleScan Connect website to scan and send documents to a selection of other sites.
pros: Scans to a variety of Web sites via the SimpleScan Connect site
cons: Depends entirely on Web sites to process scanned documents, and primarily on them to store the documents

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Had to return since the "open box" item was broken. Would not turn on or connect to my computer!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back. I can't just scan to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. I can't just scan to the desktop with it. The website crashed every time I tried to access it, so I don't want it...
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but seems to need internet access to work
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works extremely well. When you scan, you specify ahead of time if the scan will go to a file, efax, dropbox, or whatever, making it a really good way to automatically organize your data. On the other hand, you have to go to their website whenever you want to use the scanner, which would not make it good for realtors or other people who may want to scan something when they are not on the internet. I felt the different attachments that automatically kick the sheet back at you were very clever, but you will only use one and the others will be thrown out... that seemed wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Just Trying to Help

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I own a couple of different scanners as I scan documents and pictures for my ancestry files. This scanner is a bit bulky for "travel" but it works. I've been using to scan paperwork for scouts. This way I an review their work later and they can still keep their originals. It's a bit slow, so I would not recommend it for "big" or "quick" jobs, but for your small, portable jobs, I think its a good and affordable scanner. I only gave it 3 stars because it is heavier/bulkier than I expected for travel and it does only scan 300dpi. It's better for B/W vs. color, but again...serves my purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Decent scanner
customer_reviews.text: If you work in an office, industry or position that requires you to constantly share & collaborate with cloud storage services, this scanner & software could very well make your life a lot easier. It's not the perfect choice for me in my use case, but that doesn't mean that it couldn't be the right choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Meng Qi

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and do own a few mobile scanners. I was shocked to see how big this thing is. It's just way too bulky and big for a mobile scanner. As far as scanning goes, it is just OK. The resolution at most is 300dpi.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Crooked scan images
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice compact scanner and it scans both sides of pages. Plenty of app type options for scanning control methods. But, it's not making true images for me. I've experimented with trying to feed the pages slightly differently, but keep getting crooked images with blacked out segments. Seems like the mechanism that pulls the page through doesn't present the paper to the image capture area smoothly. I contacted the company's tech support - they told me to try recalibrating, which I did and that did not help. Passed that on to tech support and never heard back. Maybe they know it's expected? Anyway, I can't recommend this scanner based on my experience with it and with the company.
customer_reviews.author: brazos49

customer_reviews.title: not usable
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few scanners in my day (flatbed and fed scanners like this one) and this device was the worst one I've had to date. I have no qualms with the scanning quality, but the real issue here is the speed at which you can feed documents into the device. It is no faster than owning a flatbed scanner. Do yourself a favor and check out the Fujitsu Scansnap...you'll be a lot happier
customer_reviews.author: Sri Chandrasekar

customer_reviews.title: Software could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known this wasn't really for home users, but more for businesses, with cloud storage. I like all my stuff on my own computer. So many well-known companies have been hacked that I just don't like putting everything the scanner's website. I have personal geneology and medical files I would rather keep confidential. Installation requires going to the site to get the software. Yuk. I'm old-fashioned and just want a disk. It works fine, pages go in and out easily. The quality is fine for my purposes. I would just as soon have my old scanner that does one page at a time. But I can see the allure for people in the technological age.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile scanner - and service
customer_reviews.text: Love the scanner - especially the paper return and the vertical stand. The SimpleScan service is really good with a great list of services that keep increasing. The free mobile app was a great extra benefit that I can use with the service.
customer_reviews.author: boxerx

product_meta.title: SimpleScan DP SM48300 Duplex Mobile Document Scanner
product_meta.description:
View larger SCAN AND SO MUCH MORE
Simplify your life and make the digitization of paperwork and document management easy and efficient. Included with the scanner are the SimpleScan Connect web services that provide the easiest way to store, organize, manage and share your contacts, finances, documents, and media across popular cloud services. 

Quickly and easily scan documents, send them directly to your computer, favorite online storage or try out something new with our ever-expanding set of cloud-enabled web applications. Manage and access all of your content from a computer, tablet or mobile phone.

CONNECT TO POPULAR, PUBLIC CLOUD SERVICES
No one needs another piece of software to download, learn and maintain. SimpleScan Connect brings together hardware, mobile apps, and best-of-breed cloud-based services without the burdensome proprietary software - keeping it simple and productive for you.

Already storing and sharing content in the cloud? Continue to use what you know by connecting to one of popular online storage providers. No need to create a new system to manage your content. 

SAFE AND SECURE
Rest assured, your data is safe and secure. SimpleScan Connect does not see or store your passwords because we employ the leading industry standards to protect your privacy and your content. 

DESIGNED FOR MOBILITY
Ever notice how small things can make a big difference? Consider these features designed to enhance simplicity and mobility:

 * SimpleScan DC mobile app (iOS & Android) connects your smart phone to your content and services, anywhere, anytime
 * USB power source, no AC outlet required
 * 3 configuration options to fit any space requirement
 * Simple paper return that feeds the document back into your hand 
 * Stylish and functional, hardware designed for portability and mobility

MORE PRODUCTIVITY WITH MORE SERVICES
SimpleScan Connect is unique because we offer a growing list of additional cloud-based web services to help manage your digital content, like invoice processing, eFax, and expense processing. The optical character recognition (OCR) functionality turns all text into searchable information. Digitizing content is the first best step to productivity, but don’t stop there, we have more to offer!

Flexible Hardware Configuration OPTIMAL FEATURES
 * Optical resolution is configurable up to 300 dpi, providing file size management
 * Designed for Mobility – on the road or in your office, no AC power required 
 * Simplex scanning speed: 10ppm in B&W and 6ppm in Color
 * Duplex scanning speed: 10ppm in B&W and 4ppm in Color
 * Includes SimpleScan Connect for cloud-based document management
 * 24/7 US-based customer support
 * Available in black or white 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX
 * One Very Cool Scanner
 * Quick Start Guide
 * 6’ USB Cable
 * 2 Stands (Horizontal & Vertical)
 * Paper Return
 * Photo/Document Sleeves & Cleaning Sheet
 * Travel Bag

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
 * Pentium IV or later
 * Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
 * Mac OS X 10.6 or later
 * 1GB RAM & 2GB Hard Disk Space
 * Internet Connection
 * USB Port
